snippet.title: The Train: Escape to Normandy (PC/DOS Version), Accolade™,1987
snippet.description:
in The Train, you are a leader in the French Resistance. Your Mission: Capture the armored "war train" and successfully commandeer it through enemy lines for a rendezvous with the Allies at Riviere and Escape to Normandy™
---
C64 version here - http://youtu.be/E4F5POZfRT4
